Class Movie

java.lang.Object
Movie
public class Movie extends Object
Represents an object of type Movie. A Movie object has a title, some Actors, and results for the twelve Bechdel tests.
Version:
(1 Dec 2022, 4:35pm)
Author:
Hae Rin Hong, Alejandra Robayo, Nile Rankin-Watson
